entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Crossgen outerloop regression: JIT/opt/Devirtualization/Comparer_get_Default/Comparer_get_Default on OSX ARM64 #109395
  • System.Diagnostics.Metrics out of proc monitoring improved histogram support #109388
    10.0.0
  • Upgrade opensuse helix usage to 15.6 #109383
  • JIT: Delegate GDV check is not being hoisted outside the loop #109379
  • Can the http headers constants be moved somewhere that isnt a "DotnetPlatform" package type? #109373
  • Re-enable sdk -> runtime (main) subscription when source-build starts again publishing a source-build transport package for sdk #109369
    10.0.0
  • Microsoft.Management.Infrastructure.CimSession.Create Error #109368
  • [API Proposal]: System.Security.Cryptography.Oid should have a ToString() implementation #109366
    Future
  • JIT: Bound check elimination regression #109365

Closed

  • HttpClient doesn't support proxy server in HTTPS protocol in Linux #102441
    Future
  • win/x86: Assertion failed '!fgRngChkThrowAdded' during 'Calculate stack level slots' #108851
    10.0.0
  • ThreadLocal<T> memory leak #109387
  • [9.0] Strings differ assert in System.Text.Tests.EncodingExtensionsTests.Convert_Decoder_ReadOnlySpan_IBufferWriter #108005
    Future
  • Codify that String.Create can write over the string's null terminator #106903
    Future
  • Calling DllImported method in bass.dll crashes application with exception code 0xc0000409 in .NET 9 on Windows #109377
    9.0.0
  • DependencyInjectionEventSourceTests.EmitsDynamicMethodBuiltEvent test failure on Windows in CI #35753
    Future
  • First class support for Vectored I/O #109358
  • Published windows forms application complains about missing runtime on windows 11 #106579

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: account for newly unreachable blocks in morph #109394
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update ConstructorParamIncompleteBinding Exception Message #109393
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Fix missing analyzer warning for generics in containing type #109392
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Eliminate redundant SafePasswordHandle values #109391
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix Version.Details.xml SHA typo #109389
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] handle case of Proc Index > MAX_SUPPORTED_CPUS #109386
    Servicing-consider, area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] handle case of Proc Index > MAX_SUPPORTED_CPUS #109385
    Servicing-consider, area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • JIT: Don't assume unsigned division always produces non-negative result in value numbering #109384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add ref/out keywords on arguments for shadow methods in GeneratedComInterface #109382
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, blocking, source-generator
  • [android] Fix crash in method_to_ir #109381
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add a note about our guaranteed string.Create behavior #109380
    needs-area-label
  • Gc poll without HELPER_METHOD_FRAME #109378
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Generate build metadata for illink #109376
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/9.0] Use floating tag for webassembly image #109374
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Consume native deps install script from arcade #109371
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • SPMI: Sort summary by collection name #109370
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Native AOT: marshal empty array as non-null #109360
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Use properties for some [GeneratedRegex]s #109118
    area-Meta
  • JIT: fix non-funclet EH empty finally/fault removal #109361
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cdac] Implement `IXCLRDataTask::CreateStackWalk` #109350
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • handle case of Proc Index > MAX_SUPPORTED_CPUS #109295
    area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • SPMI: Use Helix work directory for SPMI download #109367
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixed dependency injection event source tests randomly failing. #107465
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • UInt128 improve division by 64 bit on x64 #99747
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [cdac] cleanup tests in a few ways #109357
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Move static helpers to managed #108167
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Use floating tag for webassembly image #109240
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Remove "getenv" calls #109339
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Forward NetCoreAppToolCurrentVersion in DotNetBuild.props #109331
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • Disable more red tests for crossgen lanes #109317
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Move unboxing helpers to managed code #109135
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Bump versions of maintenance-packages dependencies consumed in runtime #108806
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, blocked
  • use `Stopwatch.GetElapsedTime` for rate limiter #109213
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Increase timeouts in CustomConverterTests #108879
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Update ThunkGenerator to handle multi-nested classes #109210
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Adding CPUID for AVX10.2 #109302
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Randomized allocation sampling #104955
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Lazily-initialize RegexCompiler's cached reflection members #109283
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Add draft of runtime async ECMA-335 changes #104063
    area-Meta
  • Update the CPUID and XSAVE logics for APX #104637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Remove the rest of the SimdAsHWIntrinsic support #106594
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [cdac] GetMethodDescData for jitted methods #109187
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Cleanup after GC info version update. #108117
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Re-enable skiasharp WBT tests #109232
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 10.0.0
  • Improve handling of encoding of X.520 attributes #109349
    area-System.Security, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • implement optimized nibblemap #108939
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Add 3-opt implementation for improving upon RPO-based layout #103450
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Remove thread contention from Activity Start/Stop #109359
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, 9.0.x
  • ARM64-SVE: Allow LCLs to be of type MASK #109286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Add Message property to ExperimentalAttribute #108216
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Re-enable trimming of library tests on Apple mobile #104097
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 10.0.0
  • Replace use of target dependent `TestZ` intrinsic #104488
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Add managed MachO signing #108992
    area-HostModel
  • Move GenTreeVecCon and GenTreeMskCon under the respective FEATURE_* defines #104932
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] JIT: Read back all replacements before statements with implicit EH control flow #109143
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.1
  • [NOMERGE] Force log ASP.NET Errors in http-stress #109152
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Remove redundant sign/zero extension for SIMD broadcasts #108824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Increase timeouts in System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.OptionsTests #108702
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Make loop inversion graph based #109346
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix `IsOSVersionAtLeast` when build or revision are not provided #109332
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime, os-maccatalyst, 9.0.1
  • Moved inlinearray_value to infrequent_data structure in MonoClass #109363
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • PersistedAssemblyBuilder missing methods on generated types #109320
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [WIP][mono] Try enable fullAOT-llvm arm64 CI jobs #106615
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Enable for PAC while compiling coreclr (not the jitted code) #108561
    arch-arm64, os-linux, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Handle IOV_MAX limit in RandomAccess #109340
    area-System.IO, 10.0.0
  • Add TryAdd and TryGetValue overloads with `out int index` to OrderedDictionary #109324
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Delete DomainAssembly #108618
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove all kernel32.dll references and debug breakpoints #108647
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] fix redundant CRLF response during SMTP negotiate #109112
    area-System.Net
  • Implement IUtf8SpanParsable on System.Version #109252
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Remove PAL_Random and move palrt APIs into the minipal #108999
    area-Infrastructure
  • Give unique event ID to TRANSACTION_CREATED_OLETX_EVENTID #109138
    area-System.Transactions, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] Add forwarding support for WasmLinkage on LibraryImport #109364
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 9.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-30
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Implement DevDeviceId generation and transmission #42804
    9.0.1xx
  • dotnet-watch - using Process.Kill(false) hangs tests on Linux/OSx #44496
  • Application Crash when libpng is installed on the system macOS Sequoia #44425

Updated

  • error MSB3231: Unable to remove directory #42963
  • Track signature errors #42870
  • ToolInstallCommandTests.WhenRunWithRoot is flaky #42346
  • Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers.IntegrationTests are pulling from Docker Hub #42026
  • VMR CI build failures during restore: feed download failed #41590
  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
    Backlog
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
  • Darwin Build_Release failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
  • Analyzer for redundant NuGet packages #44533
  • CS8785 error after updating from 8.0.304 to 8.0.306 SDK #44145
  • Regression with package restore: RID Graph not respected when selecting native library from nuget package #4195
  • Building with SDK 8.0.403 unexpectedly generates WinRT-related code #44026
  • Could not copy the file deps.json because it was not found. Microsoft.Common.CurrentVersion.targets 4919 #17645
    Backlog
  • The Visual Studio version displays incorrectly on the SDK installer page. #44360
  • dotnet compiler crashes when compiling inside a sandbox #31668
  • .NET to COM/ActiveX - params/ParamArray not supported for VB98/VB6 and earlier #44460
  • Winforms/WPF .NET9.0 app cannot be ran on Windows 10 20H2(OS build 19042.2965) #43115

PullRequests

Created

  • Browser refresh and WASM delta applier refactoring #44539
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [release/9.0.2xx] add `dotnet new sln --format slnx` #44538
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • sln-list: Support for slnx #44537
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Don't force base image manifests to have a mediaType #44530
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Add MSTest among common workloads #44523
    untriaged

Merged

  • add `dotnet new sln --format slnx` #44469
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [ADD] dotnet solution migrate #44419
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #44212
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Rename the source build SmokeTests to just source build tests #44514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Better structure VMR join points for resolvers #44428
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Aspire notifications #44348
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • [FIX] tool-update: Compare tool versions correctly #44517
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the sdk target to net10.0 #43015
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Gather test diag logging to track down nuget issue #44455
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [FIX] tool-install: Use RestoreActionConfig options #44487
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Move test templates to SDK repo #44417
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44479
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ```await``` completion should trigger on ```yield``` in IAsyncEnumerables #75675
    Backlog

Closed

  • An `unmanaged` constraint check causes a stack overflow in an error scenario #75620
    17.13
  • IntelliSense cannot detect IAsyncEnumerable's yield return type when that parameter is used #68027
    17.13
  • Programmatically (from Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Project) check for <CodeAnalysisRuleSet> #38978
  • Linux Arm64 build csc hangs with 9.0.100-rc.1 SDK #75243
  • Generate new type dialog from struct interface list as generic type parameter only allows generating interfaces #63280
    Backlog
  • Cyclic assignment should generate a ref safety error #75592
    17.13
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35429.238 #75673

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix flow of CompilerGeneratedFilesOutputPath from CPS #75674
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Merge release/dev17.13 to main #75672
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Detect struct cycles caused by erroneous field-like event declarations #75668
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Bind lambda in `yield return` despite errors #75660
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure discards are initially soft selected in VSCode #75655
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix generate type dialog invoked on type argument in a base list #63378
    Area-IDE, Community, VSCode, Next
  • Reduce allocations in VirtualCharService.CreateVirtualCharSequence #75654
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Reduce allocations in TextDocumentStates.AddRange #75640
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix ref analysis of self-assignment #75618
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next

Updated

  • Ref safety: replace uint scope with struct Lifetime #75647
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Adjust `ContainingSymbol` for substituted local function #75636
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.13
  • Fix reference finding for tuple fields and anonymous type properties #69804
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community, Needs API Review, VSCode, Backlog
  • Respect [MemberNotNull] on local functions #75448
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • VB: Recognize and check an `unmanaged` constraint #75665
    Language-VB, Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, 17.13
  • Reduce memory and CPU costs due to SegmentedList usage #75661
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Allow suppressing foreach iteration variable nullability mismatch #75432
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • EditorConfig comments cannot follow a property value #51625
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Editor Config, VSCode
  • Handle directives in trailing trivia #75595
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Reduce allocations in ProjectSystemProjectFactory.ConvertMetadataReferencesToProjectReferences_NoLock #75646
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Reduce allocations in AbstractAsynchronousTaggerProvider.ComputeDifference #75639
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Deprecated str.substr warning #58720
  • Include known error responses in OpenAPI metadata/generated OpenAPI doc #58719
  • [Blazor WASM] Razor helper methods will not render content when used as inner HTML of components #58717
  • [Blazor] Improve the experience with quickgrid and EF #58716
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Publishing Blazor WASM on .NET 8 Fails Due to Integrity Checks with Cloudflare Script Injection #58714
  • Issue: preventDefault Not Working in Blazor Interactive WebAssembly Events in .NET 8 #58718
  • Blazor IJSInProcessObjectReference.Invoke is attributed with RequiresUnreferencedCode #58712
    Backlog
  • Footer in QuickGrid #58711
    Backlog
  • grpcurl reflection in IIS(express) error "server closed the stream without sending trailers" #58709

Closed

  • Advanced component Blazor #41684
    Backlog
  • Please add support for constants for @page directive #54126
    Backlog
  • Dotnet 8 - Blazor Server - JS Interopt Can't Be Used In Delegating Handlers with Prerender Off #58682
  • Blazor - Why does NavigationManager.BaseUri not output https in the deployed application, but http? #58685
  • input type="password" component not able to get data from variable. #58634
  • in k8s asp core webapi causes large memory consumption in dotnet/aspnet 8.0.10-noble-amd64 #58687
  • OpenAPI Throws `System.ArgumentNullException` #58659

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove RequiresUnreferencedCode in IJSInProcessObjectReference #58713
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • use GeneratedRegex property #58710
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Merged

  • Correct typo in WebApplication.cs #58708
    community-contribution, area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • Add examples for attributes #58196
    area-mvc, 10.0-preview1
  • Add registry search for upgrade policy keys #58095
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Add package for consuming Blazor framework assets #58721
    area-blazor
  • Convert ref and runtime packs to use the SharedFramework SDK and Arcade's installer tooling #58612
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • Provide analyzer for removing unneeded public partial class Program #58482
    analyzer, feature-mvc-testing, area-minimal
  • Fix for: Minimal APIs and controllers treat header arrays differently #58251
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-minimal
  • don't throw a misleading exception upon a BadHttpRequestException #58688
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Correct typo in ProtectedPersonalDataAttribute.cs & PersonalDataAttribute.cs #58664
    area-identity, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cant have ApplicationDisplayVersion Conditionally in Maui Projects #25619
  • Blazor Maui touch events overload make UI unresponsive during many touch events during heavy workload. #25612
  • [Testing] Add AllLists Sample to Manual Testing to validate performance expectations #25609
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Binding context type check fails for relative binding sources #25608
    .NET 9 SR1
  • MAUI ios application build fails with clang error code 137 #25607
  • Empty View Overlapping Header in CollectionView with CollectionViewHandler2 in .Net9 #25606
    Backlog
  • MacCatalyst ToolTips are inconsistent, and do not update. #25604
  • Blank target links no longer works on iOS 18 in BlazorWebView #25602
  • OnNavigating wrong target when tapping the same tab #25599
  • IndicatorView with Template wont show when ItemSource reaches 0 Elements #25598
  • Navigation freeze the UI when clicking the [Back] button. #25597

Closed

  • Filter "Remarks" from Maui properties Intellisense #25220
    .NET 9 SR1
  • 8.0.82 to 8.0.90 causes slow down on iOS #25578
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Visual Studio 17.11.5 causes Windows MAUI to break build #25160
    .NET 9 SR1
  • [MAUI]Go to 'My Recipes' page throw exception"Attempted to read or write protected memory. This is often an indication that other memory " #25002
    .NET 9 SR1
  • .NET 9 GA Reviewing Localization PRs for Backporting #25328
    .NET 9 SR1
  • Update CV2 on NET9.0 GA #25325
    .NET 9 SR1
  • I don't see the curly bars in the status bar #25594
  • TableView TextCell command executes only once #21112

    .NET 9 SR1
  • [Mac Catalyst] Allow to set window coordinates and size #25603
  • [MAUI][iOS18.0][macOS15.0] I6 & I9 - Clicking on some pages will throw an exception. #24838
    Backlog

Created

  • Add Localization tests #25620

  • [release/9.0.1xx] Update some versions for ga #25616

    community ✨

Merged

  • Bump ASPNet Versions #25610
    .NET 8 SR9.3
  • [ci] Skip provisioning extra #25605

  • [Testing] Written UI test for the issue resolved in PR 25453 #25573
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [release/9.0.1xx] LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20241029212245301 to net9.0 #25593

  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20241029171919460 to net9.0 #25579

    area-testing
  • Fixed [Windows] TapGestureRecognizer not working on Entry #25311

    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • [Testing] More Appium actions #25569
    area-testing
  • [Android] Ensure all controls in Layout with Search Bar are visible in Landscape Mode #24198
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • CollectionView, the footer moves to the bottom of the page when the empty view or empty view template is enabled #24997
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fix [Android]Text Clipping Issue in Entry with Long Strings #25554
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-entry

    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • [Mac Catalyst] Set window dimensions #24001
    community ✨
  • [iOS] ScrollView's Gradient Background fix #25541
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • [iOS] Setting background color on the Searchbar - fix #23355
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Android] Page.IsBusy activity indicators gets stuck/causes multiple to be displayed #23745
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation
  • Picker in ListView works on Windows but not on Android #24403
    community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Fix BindingAdapterPosition Exception #22676
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fixed [Android] Label's HorizontalTextAlignment property is not updated properly at runtime #25176
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • Fix TabBar visibility when navigating back from a non-tabbed page to a tabbed page #25004
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Fix Text entry border disappear when changing to/from dark mode in Android #24433

  • [Android] Fix app crash caused by dynamic template switching in ListView #24808

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add GetSchemaQualifiedHistoryTableName method to SqlServerEntityTypeExtensions #35018
  • Property not being ignored by EntityTypeBuilder #35017

Closed

  • EFCore 9 RC2 - Issue with translation of DbFunction when EF.Constant is used as an argument #34962
  • Temporary primary keys and actual primary keys cannot be the same #34989

PullRequests

Created

  • Add custom file header when scaffolding #35021
  • Move NonNullableConventionState to CoreAnnotationNames #35020
  • Fix to #35007 - EF Core fails to translate LINQ query to SQL if JOIN contains multiple columns #35019

Merged

  • [release/8.0-staging] Update macOS images to 13 #35005
    tell-mode
  • [release/9.0-staging] Update macOS images to 13 #35004
    tell-mode

Updated

  • [release/9.0-staging TEST ONLY] adjusting some migration tests so that baselines dont depend on the product version #34977
    tell-mode
  • Update macOS images to 13 #35003
